extensionDescription.message: Web annotation system inspired by Zotero. Highlight, underline, and manage annotations on any page.

noAnnotationsTitle.description: Title when no annotations are present.

noAnnotations.message: Highlight text on the page to get started!
noAnnotations.description: Helper text when no annotations are present.

deleteAnnotation.description: Tooltip for the delete annotation button.

lockSidebarWidth.description: Tooltip for the lock sidebar button.

unlockSidebarWidth.description: Tooltip for the unlock sidebar button.

errorLoading.message: Could not load annotations. Please refresh the page.
errorLoading.description: Error message when annotations fail to load.

closeButton.description: Tooltip for the close sidebar button.

disableOnPageLabel.description: Label for the disable on page switch.

disableOnDomainLabel.description: Label for the disable on domain switch.

forceBlackColorLabel.description: Label for the force black text switch.

forceBlackColorTooltip.message: Forces all highlighted text to be black. This improves readability but can affect the original color of various elements (except for links, which are now distinguishable).
forceBlackColorTooltip.description: Tooltip for the force black text switch.

editLinkTitle.description: Title for the link editor modal.

textLabel.description: Label for the link text input.

linkTextPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the link text input.

urlPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the link URL input.

urlLabel.description: Label for the link URL input.

disableOnThisPage.description: Action to disable on the current page.

disableOnThisWebsite.description: Action to disable on the current website.

donationsTitle.message: You keep Quantum Highlighter PRO free and alive

donationsText.message: Hi! I'm George, the creator and sole developer behind Quantum Highlighter. My promise is and always will be that this tool is free and of the highest quality. There's no big company behind it, just countless hours of work and the dream of creating something truly useful for you. To keep innovating, I need your help.

oneTimeDonationDescription.message: Support the development of Quantum Highlighter PRO with a single gesture. Every contribution brings us closer to our next major update.

oneTimeDonationButton.message: Of course, I'll buy you a coffee!

monthlySubscriptionDescription.message: Ensure the future of the project with recurring support. Our sponsors are the foundation of sustainable growth.

remindMeLater.description: Button to remind later for donation.

dontRemindAgain.message: Ok, I promise I won't forget (but don't notify me again)
dontRemindAgain.description: Button to never remind for donation.

remindMeLaterTooltip.message: I will remind you again after 80 more highlights.
remindMeLaterTooltip.description: Tooltip for the remind me later button.

donationThanksTitle.description: Title for the donation thank you message.

donationThanksText.message: Your contribution is essential to keep improving and offering a quality tool. Let's keep working together to achieve the most useful and impressive tool on the market.
donationThanksText.description: Text for the donation thank you message.

donateButton.description: Button to open the donation section.

heroTitle.description: Main title of the welcome page.

heroSubtitle.message: The smartest way to highlight, underline, and take notes on any website.

howItWorksTitle.description: Title for the 'How it works' section.

step1Text.message: Just select any text on a webpage.

step2Text.message: Choose a color and highlight type from the menu that appears.

step3Text.message: Add rich-formatted notes to your highlights.

feature1Text.message: Organize your ideas with a vibrant color palette.

feature2Text.message: Choose between a background highlight or an elegant underline.

feature3Text.message: Use bold, lists, links, and more in your notes.

feature4Text.message: Manage and navigate all your notes in one place.

feature5Text.message: Works perfectly on dynamic sites like ChatGPT.

feature6Text.message: Adjust the extension to your liking from the settings menu.

feature7Text.message: Your notes and settings are automatically synced across all your devices.

ctaTitle.description: Title for the call to action section.

ctaText.message: Go to any webpage, select some text, and start organizing your knowledge.
ctaText.description: Text for the call to action section.

ctaTip.message: Tip: You can open the sidebar at any time using the keyboard shortcut (Ctrl + Shift + H by default) or from the extension icon.
ctaTip.description: Tip for the call to action section.

customAmountText.message: Or choose any other amount. Thank you!
customAmountText.description: Text for the custom amount in the donation card.

customAmountTextMonthly.message: You can choose any amount to donate monthly.
customAmountTextMonthly.description: Text for the custom amount in the monthly subscription card.

highlightSavedLocally.description: Toast message when a highlight is too large to sync.
